typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDate as date 'mm-dd-yyyy',
		Region as string,
		Rep as string,
		Item as string,
		Units as double,
		UnitCost as double,
		Total as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 pivot(pivotBy(OrderDate),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
